lu.uni.geko.joinpointdetection.drools
Class PcRulesVisitor

java.lang.Object
  lu.uni.geko.joinpointdetection.drools.PcRulesVisitor

public class PcRulesVisitor
extends Object

A visitor that generates Drools rules for a pointcut model. Note that this visitor differs from the common design pattern. We do not need to make every visited EObject implement a visit method as all state of EObjects is available via getters.

          Visits the root element of a pointcut model in two separate phases.

Method Detail

visitPointcut

public void visitPointcut(org.eclipse.emf.ecore.EObject pointcut)
Visits the root element of a pointcut model in two separate phases.
1) visits all pointcut contents recursively to declare the corresponding variables together with their attributes
2) resolves all references within the content of the pointcut

Parameters:
pointcut - the root element of a pointcut model

getPointcutRules

public String getPointcutRules()
Returns:
the generated drools pointcut rules

declareFirstLayerElements

private void declareFirstLayerElements(List<org.eclipse.emf.ecore.EObject> firstLayerElements)
Visits all first layer pointcut contents to declare the corresponding variables together with their attributes and calls itself recursively on the contents of these elements.

Parameters:
firstLayerElements - the direct children elements of the root pointcut element

resolveReferencesOfFirstLayerElements

private void resolveReferencesOfFirstLayerElements(Collection<org.eclipse.emf.ecore.EObject> firstLayerElements)
Resolves all references within the first layer pointcut contents and calls itself recursively on the contents of these elements.

Parameters:
firstLayerElements - the direct children elements of the root pointcut element
